author: cmpilato
msg: Expand the storage of directory entry lists to include an optional
move ID for children that will need it.
Also, remove duplicate doc string from svn_fs_base__dag_delete().
(get_dir_entries): Now return a hash of directory_entry_t's instead
(copy_kind_t): Add new copy_kind_move and copy_kind_soft_move enums.
values for the returned hash, and recognizes the new 3-tuple
(svn_fs_base__unparse_entries_skel): New expects hash values to be
directory_entry_t * items, and writes the optional MOVE_ID entry
svn_fs_base__parse_copy_skel): Handle new copy types for moves.
svn_fs_dirent_t's for return from the public API.  Also, expect
that the trail function will return a non-NULL hash (because it
does when it doesn't error out).  And use a subpool for the

author: cmpilato
msg: Merge -r16125:16128 from trunk into the "fs-atomic-renames" branch.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix an auto-merge regression (though one probably never seen in
production) I inadvertantly introduced in r15569.
populate the 'kind' field of the svn_fs_dirent_t object it
returns, revert to using svn_fs_base__dag_node_kind() to check
